google.subtitle: A Free Post-Apocalyptic Thriller Prequel
google.description: "One of the most thrilling writers working today. Miss him at your peril." - Blake Crouch, Wayward Pines "Like Stephen King, he knows how to summon serious scares." - Bentley Little, The Mailman AFTER: FIRST LIGHT The end is just the beginning. When NASA scientists detect intense solar activity, the warnings go unheeded. Soon communications fail, power goes out, and the world's technological infrastructure collapses. But the solar radiation has also inflicted an unpredictable change--a disruption in the impulses of the human brain. Billions die. And they may be the lucky ones... ---- "Always surprises and always entertains."- Jonathan Maberry, V-Wars "Nobody thrills like Nicholson does. Nobody." - J.A. Konrath, Origin ------------------------ Free ebook of post-apocalyptic thriller fiction. Keywords: Science fiction thriller, free horror ebook, suspense, action and adventure from a bestselling author, Free, freebie, first book in a series, free book, dystopian fiction, zombies, military, technological, technothriller, survival horror fiction, end times, doomsday book, Michael Grant, A.G. Riddle, Dean Koontz, walking dead, lost, gone, post-apocalyptic zombie story, mutants, Hugh Howey, T.W. Piperbrook, Edward W. Robertson, Bobby Adair, Justin Cronin, D.J. Molles, J.L. Bourne, survivalists
